benefits: Being physically active is a vital part of your overall health. Inactivity puts you at risk for heart disease, obesity and diabetes. You should be exercising regularly to help you improve your cholesterol and triglyceride levels, alleviate stress, drepression and anxiety, improve your sleep and stamina, and to help you manage your body weight.
instructions:
How to get started:
1. Pick one or two of your preferred exercises from the list below, or an alternative exercise of your choice. 
2.Â Prepare your workout clothing and equipment for your training session.
3. Schedule a time for your workout session: Set Reminder.

Your habit:
Start a physical activity that gets your heart pumping. Build up towards your required total time of XX minutes every week, and track your completed training sessions by checking off every successful 15 minute interval.

title: Moderate intensity training
